attributes.action: Give us the Right to Decide about our Land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the people of this country are fed up with the way all our human rights are taken from us and other bodies make decisions about how and what our taxpaying pounds are spent on and our land taken from us without our rights to have any say. When we have worked to achieve what we own how can it be compulsory purchased to house members of the Travelling Community.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
